library(MASS)
data(housing)
housing$Sat <- ordered(housing$Sat, levels = c("Low","Medium","High"))
ord <- polr(Sat ~ Infl + Type + Cont, data = housing, Hess = TRUE)
summary(ord)
library(nnet)
multi <- multinom(Species ~ Sepal.Length + Petal.Length, data = iris, trace = FALSE)
summary(multi)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment="#>", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)
